name: Jade Chan
info:
• 简体中文名: 小玉
  • 别名: Jade
  • 别名: ジェイド
  • 别名: T-Girl, Queen of the Shadowkhan (temporarily)
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1988
  • 引用来源: jackiechanadventures.wikia.com/wiki/Jade

detail: Jade is the deuteragonist of Jackie Chan Adventures. She is Jackie's 12-year-old niece from Hong Kong whom he never knew existed
